column5: Joey that could have helped us!!  Always remember to bring you sign, for the team.  I'll see if I can get my other puter up and post the sign I have.  Other wise you can use any of the others posted in the pics handwritten  We don't have a cat entry yet   Joey I apologize if I came of a little strong but we need some entries
I know.  So far I've managed to either make an improper sign or forget it all together for everyone one of my successful trips this year. My apologies.
No problem man just do what I used to do,  fold one that you know is good and put it in your tackle box or wallet

Wiser i didn't even know you were coming down. good to hear you got into some cats.  I did mange to land one but gave it away to a fellow fisherman but not before taking pics for my team i hope to have them up as soon as Curt sends them to me.
How did you shore guys make out today?? Looks like it was fairly busy!
Forget the boat we will do much better on dry land. Mike is going to be playing in the water again lol See you guys tomorow
I might be there as well ...  if you see a short asian dude, it'd be me.
You mean to tell me you're the only short asian dude around?... LOL  G

Good one G Nice to see you around again, either I just wasn't on here enough or I recall not seeing you for quite some time.  Ok now, short asian dude with the long rod. That you don't see very often do you. I'm talking about my 12' carp rods.
i'll put my trash talking on hold until after tomorrow.. just remember that last day on the ice when you were outfished by a ginger kid..

Mike i'll out fish you once again and the little kid if she shows up lol Ok trash talking will be done at the end of the day   short asian dude with the long rod? That sounds wrong lol but will see you there Victor
Fellas just leave some fish for Sunday, not asking for a lot, just a few. good luck to those fishing tomorrow!

went to the buffet @ casino niagra and they were serving "CATFISH" ooh the fish GODS are teasing me.....fresh catfish with lemon on the barbQ ...yummy     ....now to get some chicken livers and soak them in ( what the hell am I goig to soak them in ) lol  I will try to come tomorrow and bring some smelly chicken livers! Hope to say ho to a few anglers!
ur best bet is to get some sucker meat

ooh man "where" Dammit Im just going to hit the bait shop for some night crawlers, I hope to see some fellow OFC  people there! I'm in Hamilton  but probably bills bait will be closed for looong weekend!  I may try some GULP@ bait but not sure if it will work Hmmmm I haven't fished for any suckers this year so unless someone "gives" me some I'm pretty much screwed...hope to see some of you there , I am a big bald guy with pointy ears and 5 o clock shadow. I love Cat fishin they are amazing fighters!
well i wont be able to make it i dont think, but i got abit of white sucker meat here
nice of you to offer. maybe we can go fishing together sometime!
I will be there blue Spectrum grey dodge quadcab se ya there
Green 1998 Civic with PURENEWF plate.
hey thanks again, i was there today from 12 till 3 catfishing but didnt get anything, will be back again thanks
doesn't look like Im going to make it tomorrow     anyone have 1 of these at home starts with drama Ends with drama!

urp I  did manage to get to the rocks by fishmasters, this guy landed 2 monsters 10 pounder and 11 pounder, Yerm big snaffo I forgot my net there it is aluminum with blue netting!  crap!  NEwfie I hope you found it and turned it in kept it whatever my wife is flipping crazy over me leaving it!
I had to work today so it wasn't an option    How'd everyone do?  Sorry to hear about your net stout fellow I'm sure someone picked it up and will get it back to you
words to the wise < LEAVE WIFE AT HOME<<<<<<<<<    can't live with them ..that about covers it@!
we got 8 today and lost 4 Biggest was 16lbs and a 15lber
Great job Jeff!!! WTG man, leave some for me
Yea Joe its no Steelie but man are these fish fun to catch First time i've ever gone fishing for them

Then I guess I shouldn't  mention Stripers I used to fish for that went for 30+   The lower will hopefully clear soon, not near as much ice on the way home than on the way to work today.  It was mainly in the center of the river and the rainbow so hopefully it will break up
I was out today from around 11 30 to five and only managed two.  Went to Oshawa the night before looking for a sucker and drew a blank, and fishmaster was out by the time I got there.
This was the biggest of the two that I caught.

Hey guys. Myself and Alie Goby are heading to Dunnville on Friday. I know some of you are talking about going too. Just want to see if anyone else is going. Maybe we could have a beer together or something. Maybe a mini derby for braggin rights. Hope to have the boat readyt but if not from shore is good too.  Curt
I am already packed just not sure on the boat dont think I will have time to getter ready maybe see you there.
im planing on going
I'll probably be wearing an orange coat if the weather is cool. Red ball cap or Habs toque. Camo pants.
I'll be launching at Steve's at daybreak, let's hope it warms up a touch.
Is his baitshop open 24 hours? I need some cut bait.
I might be in.... but if work calls It is hard to say no to double time...  G
This sounds good. I might be able to get out that way.

man I'd so be down with this G2G, the boat is ready and everything - but Ginny's about to pop.  I'm talking the baby could come any time now and it's a 2 hour drive to the hospital in Oakville (don't ask ) from our house.  So the 45min drive back home from Dunnville to pick up a wife who's in labor just isn't isn't in the cards for me this weekend.  Good Luck - I look forward to the reports.  Cheers, UF
LOL, some people will use any excuse. Good luck with your wife
5 Great Catfish Baits   http://www.gameandfishmag.com/fishing/catf...ing/RA_0805_02/    who loves his fellow anglers more than moi!

this may sound stupid..... but I have NEVER fished for cats before... so what do I do... bring my boat anchor and still fish? Hook, meat and lead, I assume due to the currents....  Friday is supposed to be nice... at least I have a chance to catch a tan! LOL...  G

yup .. anchor (bring 2 to stop the wind from swinging back end) or nose first into the reeds ... cast out a chunk of sucker or worms or minnows .. sit back and wait  What time is everyone heading out there ... I might be able to make it  for a couple hours .. meeting at fishmasters??? .. BBQ???? .. pt Maitland???
i'd be wearing 100% camo if your gonna wear a habs toque heheheh     good luck on the kitty cats guys
I will be there in the afternoon as well, just look for the guy with 4 teenagers with him. Oh, you might be able to figure out who I am from my van as well...
Good luck guys and leave some for me.  Its a good chance I`ll be down there on Sunday.
We'll be at fishmaster's in the morning

I'll be at Fishmaster's Friday morning.  If you see an older red lund with a longer haired kid, say hi.  Would you say cut up sucker is the best bait?  And does Fishmaster have the bait available for purchase?
I have caught catfish on chunks of hot dogs, chicken liver, 3-4 worms on a hook. But yes cut up sucker works probably the best and Fishmaster should have some in his shop, he did last year.
Alrighty, thanks.
Also, when will he be open on Friday?  Is it 9 like his messageboard says?
are there ane places i can go after these cats from shore i dont have a boat, any help would be appriciated thanks

There has been bigger Cats this Spring caught right off my rocks infront of my store then some of the Cats in the boats 25.6lbs was caught last Friday off the rocks No Derby Ticket lol...no need for a boat if you don't have one ...I will be on the water Doing Cat Charters all weekend but the store will be Open we usally don't Open till 9am but might change that this weekend for your fellow Fisherman ...Best Bite has been 11 to 12noon  till around Dark ..seems they don't turn on till the day warms up a little ...so to tell you all the truth there is no need to be on the water at day break...so Sleep in a little and get them arms ready for some Action ... Fishmaster
Ok I will be there.... Mike (Bitsmith2k) will be with me and possibly Goran (Uncle Buck) Look for the beige Polarkraft with the OFC flag  G..
Looks like the boat won't be ready.
